Container with the medicines. Convenient container for the transportation of medicines.
Container with the medicines.
Wooden box with preserves inside. Evidently still good meat. It's well preserved, we know how to make good food.
Wooden box with preserves inside.
Personal statements.
Statement.
This is Charon I am waiting for you ... there is an urgent matter.
Communication diagram of Pripyat and Chernobyl. Drawings and graphics. Hard for an inexperienced man to understand them.
Diagram of the communications of Pripyat and Chernobyl.
Small metallic container. Solomon's sending.
Small metallic container.
Letter for Sobolyev from Zahar covered by strong cardboard packaging.
Letter from Zahar.
Millboard with the list of the agents, which one way or another cooperated with the military.
Millboard with the list of agents.
Duke's Winchester.
Computer disk from Laboratory X-10 at the Radar.
Computer unit.
Documents from Laboratory X-10 at the Radar.
Documents from Lab X-10.
A fragment of the map, on which is indicated the hiding place of Semetsky's cache.

Semetsky's hiding place. It is said he stores very valuable things here.

First fragment.

Bag with Marijuana for the Duke.
Bag with the grass.
Modified rifle 'Protecta'.
Sniper cartridge with a marker beacon tag.
Modified sniper cartridge for a modified 'Protecta' for the needs of the scientists. This cartridge possesses very little power, it does not kill, but suspends a small beacon on the victim. This makes it possible to investigate the flora in the Zone.
The modified rifle 'Protecta' for the needs of scientists, which uses only one type of cartridges. A sniper cartridge with a marker tag. This cartridge is a highly under powered. To kill someone is almost impossible.
To hang labels on the monsters: Pseudogiants was last seen in Rostok where a crashed helicopter lies. Bald Chimera can be found in the Dark Valley. You know there is still an abandoned factory there. The bandits sometimes use it as their hangout, and there is a small swamp next to the fence where the waste pipes are. Well I hope you understand. A bloodsucker in the Cordon near a destroyed railway bridge and abandoned pig farms. Now about how to hang a label: I'll give you a rifle 'Protecta', reworked by one of our handymen. It shoots only a special cartridge which in contact with the body of the target hangs a label while not causing any harm. Thus you need to hang a label on all three mutants. Do not forget to return the rifle. To kill outright it will not work, and it still is useful to us. If all goes well I will put onto your PDA useful information about a transition from yantar to the Radar. And of course you cannot kill any of these mutants, I need them alive.
'Heart of the Controller'.
Rare artifact. To find it is possible, but it is very complicated, and that for this it is necessary to have special equipment. This artifact attracts monsters to itself, especially Controllers. Because of this they call it 'Heart of the Controller'. This artifact protects well from bullet wounds, but if a Controller attacks you this artifact will not help, vice-versa, will increase the effect the Controller has your brain.
Wolf's PDA.
Personal PDA of Wolf.
In the Garbage near the transition to the Dark Valley, a meeting will occur between Cross and the Chekhovs. You don't want to be seen!! Chekhov's people are nervous; therefore trigger happy. If they see you they will start shooting immediately. There is a destroyed building near the checkpoint. That's where you go for an excellent view. Zashkersya is there. Sit and stay. If all goes well then they'll disperse peacefully with their weapons put away. But if shooting begins then kill all those nitz, and most importantly look after Cross. In short, before my signal do not shoot and do not be seen, sit still and wait. I know you, just be patient.
Kruglov's Detector.
Kruglov's Detector, use it by hanging it on the belt, it will help you to discover of a very rare artifact called 'Heart of the Controller'.
Journal of the mad professor.
Diary of an insane professor. Apparently this professor worked in the Yantar lab. What particularly interested him was how Psi settings worked.
Laptop computer from X-16.
Laptop computer from X-16. There were research records compiled over the years. Perhaps when the X-16 was a fairly large lab, but then something happened and employees ran away, but most still many roam the plant, not as people anymore, but as wandering zombies.
Kruglov's Colt.
Kruglov's Colt. Altered by a skillful individual, a Colt with silencer that shoots a special cartridge which does not kill its victims, but only paralyses them for a period of time.
Special cartridge of scientists.
Special cartridge of scientists. This altered cartridge, size 9x19, does not kill the victim, but only temporarily paralyses them.
Kruglov's case.
Kruglov's case, intended for General Voronin.
Bag of 'grass'.
Small package with the 'grass', not parsley or dill. It is Marijuana.
Monolith's flash drive.
Monolith's flash drive from the X-18 Laboratory.
According to a Varangian, Major Yarofeev said that it is possible to go beyond the Cordon, and beyond the checkpoint.
Go to the Lab at Yantar and find anything: documents, computer, laptop or any thing that will help us understand what was going on. Whatever you find take to Fang, he'll be waiting in Warehouses on a farm near the base of Freedom. They say that in the Laboratory there is something that burns the brains of all living things. Talk to the scientists, maybe they can help.
There was one person I used to work with, but then ... then something began to occur to him, something terrible: he was yelling at night, and then suddenly fell silent would and only sit staring at one spot the whole day. Then even worse he was throwing stuff at people. We ... I had to part with him, apparently he experienced a wave of radiation from a Laboratory. Dan and the guys took him to the Radar to Sviblov, but they say he ran away. So you need to find him. He worked for a long time on the influence of psy-radiation affects on the human brain and kept a diary which contains valuable notes. If you get this log I'd be able to reconfigure your helmet.
Black box.
Black box from the crashed helicopter in Radar. Careful it is radioactive.
Ghost's PDA.
Ghost's PDA. It has data on artifacts and places of their appearance. Also is mentioned is a faction called 'Last Day' and the murder of their leader. There is a little information about the Monolith as well. Data is encoded.
-----------------------------------new-----------------------------------------
The manuscript #1.
The manuscript roll, in which is contained the first unit of the laws of the 'Monolith' brotherhood.
The manuscript #2.
The manuscript roll, in which is contained the second unit of the laws of the 'Monolith' brotherhood.
The manuscript #3.
The manuscript roll, in which is contained the third unit of the laws of the 'Monolith' brotherhood.
The manuscript #4.
The manuscript roll, in which is contained the fourth unit of the laws of the 'Monolith' brotherhood.
The manuscript #5.
The manuscript roll, which contains the fifth unit of the laws of the 'Monolith' brotherhood: \n '... the soldier that betrays the brotherhood will become an outcast, and there will be no rest for him, nor will will there be any salvation for him, and Demons will pursue him eternally, as far as one's will...'
Wooden box with the spare parts for the stove.
Wooden box of Baker.
Leather attache case with very important information inside. Sent from the 'Mainland' for Skinflint.
Leather attache case.
Bag with the rye flour, weight 25 kg.
Bag with the rye flour.
Fresh rye grain bread, which does not get stale for a month. The loaf is extremely expensive, but the one who tastes it will understand its worth. This miracle-grain can only be baked by one person in the Zone. His nickname is 'Baker'. He faithfully keeps the secret recipe for making this truly wonderful bread.
Rye grain bread.
Document #1.
The encoded information.
Document #2.
The encoded information.
Document #3.
The encoded information.
USB flash drive of Caesar.
USB flash drive, in which are stored the cipher codes of the Mercenaries.
PDA with the base codes.
PDA in which Caesar loaded general base codes. He has asked that they be taken to Earl together with the third part of the encoded documents.
Earl's PDA.
PDA in which Earl loaded the deciphered data about the special operations of the Mercenaries. This PDA must go to Fang.
Solomon's PDA.
Solomon's PDA, where his personal data are stored.
Shuttle's PDA.
Shuttle's PDA, where he stored all the information about his clients and missions. Device is badly damaged. Apparently because of the impact of anomalies, or talons and teeth of monsters.
